/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is teeming with vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
